isvte:package:pushrequest:create.description: Create PackagePushRequest and associated PackagePushJob records.

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

targetdevhubusername.name: targetdevhubusername
targetdevhubusername.description: username or alias for the dev hub org; overrides default dev hub org

targetusername.name: targetusername
targetusername.description: username or alias for the target org; overrides default target org

apiversion.name: apiversion
apiversion.description: override the api version used for api requests made by this command

packageversion.name: packageversion
packageversion.description: PackageVersionID to upgrade the subscriber to.

scheduledstarttime.name: scheduledstarttime
scheduledstarttime.description: The date and time (UTC) at which the push request is processed, in ISO 8601 format. Set this value to the earliest time that you want Salesforce to attempt to start the push. As a best practice, schedule pushes at off-peak hours like 1:00 AM Saturday. If you don’t specify a value, the push starts when the package push request’s Status is set to Pending.

organisationid.name: organisationid
organisationid.description: Single org ID to create a push request for.

subscriberorgidfile.name: subscriberorgidfile
subscriberorgidfile.description: JSON File of Subscribers to create a push request for.

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

targetdevhubusername.name: targetdevhubusername
targetdevhubusername.description: username or alias for the dev hub org; overrides default dev hub org

targetusername.name: targetusername
targetusername.description: username or alias for the target org; overrides default target org

apiversion.name: apiversion
apiversion.description: override the api version used for api requests made by this command

status.name: status
status.description: The status you want to set for the specified PackagePushRequest records.

loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

targetdevhubusername.name: targetdevhubusername
targetdevhubusername.description: username or alias for the dev hub org; overrides default dev hub org

targetusername.name: targetusername
targetusername.description: username or alias for the target org; overrides default target org

apiversion.name: apiversion
apiversion.description: override the api version used for api requests made by this command

status.name: status
status.description: The status you want to set for the specified PackagePushRequest records.

createfile.name: createfile
createfile.description: Boolean - should these results be added to a JSON file. Useful for updating or cancelling push requests in a future command.

directoryforsave.name: directoryforsave
directoryforsave.description: Directory to store the subscriber information pulled from your DevHub

isvte:package:pushrequest:subscribers.description: Retreive all subscribers for a given Package or PackageVersion

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

targetdevhubusername.name: targetdevhubusername
targetdevhubusername.description: username or alias for the dev hub org; overrides default dev hub org

targetusername.name: targetusername
targetusername.description: username or alias for the target org; overrides default target org

apiversion.name: apiversion
apiversion.description: override the api version used for api requests made by this command

orgtype.name: orgtype
orgtype.description: Filter results by org type, supply a comma separated list of OrgTypes.

orgstatus.name: orgstatus
orgstatus.description: Filter results by org status, supply a comma separated list of OrgStatus.

orderby.name: orderby
orderby.description: Order the results, supply a comma separated list of field names.  Can optionally include DESC modifier to sort in descending order.

anyinstallstatus.name: anyinstallstatus
anyinstallstatus.description: Include PackageSubscriber records with any value for InstalledStatus, by default results are restricted to only 'i', or where the package is installed.

directoryforsave.name: directoryforsave
directoryforsave.description: Directory to store the subscriber information pulled from your DevHub

isvte:package:pushrequest:update.description: Pushes a package upgrade to a specified org

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

targetdevhubusername.name: targetdevhubusername
targetdevhubusername.description: username or alias for the dev hub org; overrides default dev hub org

targetusername.name: targetusername
targetusername.description: username or alias for the target org; overrides default target org

apiversion.name: apiversion
apiversion.description: override the api version used for api requests made by this command

packagepushrequests.name: packagepushrequests
packagepushrequests.description: Comma separated list of PackagePushRequestIds to update.  Cannot be used in conjunction with --allcreated, or --allpending flags.

allcreated.name: allcreated
allcreated.description: Alternative to providing PackagePushRequestIds, updates all records that have status 'Created'.

allpending.name: allpending
allpending.description: Alternative to providing PackagePushRequestIds, updates all records that have status 'Pending'.

status.name: status
status.description: The status you want to set for the specified PackagePushRequest records.
